name: Hand-to-Hand
description:
Developed for Weekly Game Jam, week 184, Hand-to-Hand is a first person shooter where you use your hands as weapons in "hand-to-hand" combat! Shoot with your handguns or throw them as hand grenades. But beware the mini-drones, duck turrets and handmines. Can you make your way to the end?

Controls

  • WASD: Move.
  • Space: Jump.
  • LMB/RMB: Shoot.
  • Hold Shift + Hold LBM/RMB: Prepare to throw hand as a grenade. Release LMB/RMB to throw, release Shift to continue using that hand as a blaster.
  • Hold Tab + LMB/RMB: Cycle through equipped hands.
  • ESC: Pause.

Credits

  • Sam Huffer: programming, collecting and adding audio, level design.
  • Khang Trinh: programming, collecting and adding models and VFXs, animations, UI.
